courses.title: NETFLIX-GPT
courses.description: The MOVIES-GPT App is an AI-driven platform that enhances the Netflix experience. It leverages OpenAI's GPT-3.5 model to provide personalized content recommendations.

courses.title: Chess-Game
courses.description: A modern, real-time multiplayer chess game built with Node.js, Express, Socket.IO, and Chess.js. Play chess with friends in real-time with a beautiful, responsive interface.

courses.title: Configure-Bike
courses.description: A simple Configure Bike web application designed with HTML and CSS.

courses.title: 2048-Game
courses.description: A simple implementation of the classic 2048 game in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

courses.title: Dinning-App
courses.description: A Table Booking website interface created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a modern dining companion designed to simplify and elevate the restaurant experience for both customers and establishments.

courses.title: NOTE-GINIE
courses.description: NoteGenie is an intelligent note-making platform designed to empower students and lifelong learners by turning scattered thoughts or complex topics into clear, structured, and personalized notes â€” instantly. Powered by AI to generate notes.
